comments.body: One alternative is to use the 'tf.logging' module and then you can remove the 'logging' import.  Can do in a follow up PR.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +246,250 @@          break
      else:
        logging.warning("Sentence truncated: %s", sentence) 

      # Get a 1-element batch to feed the sentence to the model.
